allow: Bash(if not exist migrations_backup mkdir migrations_backup)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fresh start: clean up migrations and sync with production schema

- Deleted all conflicting migration files
- Applied critical email confirmation fix directly to production
- Pulled fresh schema from production as single baseline migration
- Ready for future migrations to be applied cleanly

)")
Bash(for file in data/*.tsx buttons/*.tsx forms/*.tsx modals/*.tsx search/*.tsx feedback/*.tsx misc/*.tsx)
Bash(for dir in data buttons forms modals search feedback misc)
